About Gerrard Group / Gerrard Machinery Company

Gerrard Group / Gerrard Machinery Company specializes in Auctions and Liquidations for a wide variety of Machinery, Equipment and other Assets. Our used machinery division, Gerrard Machinery Company, LLC, buys and sells industrial machinery and equipment as a regular course of business. This diversity gives us a broader understanding of both the retail and wholesale markets which puts our clients at a huge advantage. This, along with our strategic partners around the country and abroad, our group is able to service a wide variety of business sectors.

In addition to Auctions and Liquidations, we provide Appraisal and Consulting Services to help determine highest possible returns of Company Assets. We are not a “High Volume” or “Cookie Cutter” company, we believe every project comes with its own needs and expectations. Our team has the knowledge, dedication and understanding you need.

Whether it’s a single piece of equipment, plant relocation, multiple facilities, or demolition projects, we are your trusted source. Talk to one of our team members to discuss how we can help.
